documents.document: Lads If anyone considers using @eDreams_en DON'T 😂😂😂
I'm actually laughing at this rate 🙃🙃🙃 @eDreams_en https://t.co/1rmJUvaLah
#PlusSize gals from Ireland Tempted Boutique have fab things in at the mo! This dress is so comfy! https://t.co/XPZ9TdhUgi
AMERICA what the fuck have you done
In darkness look for the light. ⭐️⭐️⭐️ https://t.co/qd4JGiK40K
@RosemaryMacCabe Absolutely disgraceful!!
@KiaraMcM Ahh! Thank you! 🙈❤️
When you really dig your outfit 💁🏻🔥 https://t.co/8zldCvbZ2T
@eDreams_en genuinely, I will train in all your staff!
I know y'all think I'm crazy, but bad customer service needs to be challenged! @eDreams_en
@eDreams_en I'm not going to leave you alone until you've responded. You can respond publicly if you'd like 💁🏻
If y'all pay me I'll train in all your staff on proper social media etiquette💁🏻 @eDreams_en
@eDreams_en Can you please give me the details of someone to complain to?
I've been battling with @eDreams_en for a whole week. And they've responded to me twice, both times the info was useless🙃 #travel
@eDreams_en "Provides support" should not be on your twitter handle 🐸 STILL WAITING. I'm absolutely furious. Who can I speak to?
NEVER EVER use this joke of a company #travel people 🙃 https://t.co/Q6jebwRLL1
@eDreams_en I've been told that for days. I'm beyond irate at this stage.
@eDreams_en Hi guys, will someone answer my question please? Can you give me an email to complain to?
#throwback to my Indochina adventure with @contikiuk 🌎❤️ https://t.co/fNeOzlLZKo
@eDreams_en Hey, can you please respond to my DM I'd rather not wait another 6 days for a reply , thanks!
Definitely would of been ignored time and time again if I hadn't been so annoying💁🏻 @eDreams_en
Finally got a response that would of been useful 6 days ago! 🙃 steer clear of @eDreams_en #travel lads!
@eDreams_en Can you confirm that you will respond to me today?!!
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en I just don't understand! Another airline with 170K followers replied to me in 5 minutes! They've 10K 😂
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en I'm out of pocket €200 when if they had been compentant from the beginning it wouldn't of been a problem! 🙄
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en I hope they know I'm not going to take this lightly!
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en They had read my message too!
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en my nan passed away on Friday the 20th and had flights booked & even though they knew the urgency, they ignored me!
@Melan1eColl1ns @eDreams_en Hope you got sorted! I'm still waiting 6 days for a response 🙃
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en You'll be waiting 😂
@claire_ashdown @eDreams_en TBH I'd steer well clear 😅
@secreteyesEW @eDreams_en everyone says how bad this company is 🌚
@eDreams_en Can you confirm someone will reply to me before 12?
@eDreams_en I'M STILL WAITING. This is disgusting customer service!!!
@eDreams_en But you never respond to anyone? Worst customer service ever🙃 6 days and counting!
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en I'm shocked! I can't believe they operate like this!
@PinkNoam @eDreams_en They've been ignoring me for 6 days 🙃
Still waiting @eDreams_en 😡😡😡
WHO is managing your social media?!! @eDreams_en
@eDreams_en have 45 minutes until I'm waiting 6 days for a proper response 🙃
@Rosybck @eDreams_en @Trustpilot I'm a Digital Marketing Manager and by god this service is WOEFUL. Sorry to hear you're in the same boat 🙄
Inspiring read on my lunch hour 😍 https://t.co/IVH3ER00hC
Taking bets on when I'll be responded to... 🙄 https://t.co/78cJboFSt4
@Rosybck @eDreams_en I've been waiting days for a proper response 💁🏻even after I told them there was bereavement! 🙃
@eDreams_en I won't hold my breath.
@eDreams_en you're actively ignoring me, can I ask why? Who can I speak to about this awful customer service.
@eDreams_en Why are you STILL ignoring me? It's been 2 days.
@CallieThorpe @eDreams_en No one is replying to me. It's stressful enough. Their social media is a joke.
I'm down over €200 because of their lack of communication and lack of common sense. Ignoring a CUSTOMER is the worst thing you can do.
Never, EVER book with @eDreams_en after stating there was a death in the family, they've offered little advice & help & now are ignoring me🌚
Another day when @eDreams_en doesn't respond. 🙃 lads all I want is answers to my question!
@eDreams_en Think that ignoring me, will shut me up 😂
@eDreams_en if y'all want help with social media, I'll gladly give you all a training course!
@eDreams_en Can you let me know if you're going to respond to my READ message? You're further proving my point.
Absolute Couple Goals 💛My nan was a shining star ⭐️ I'll miss her forever. https://t.co/u8BsfgDkan
@magicgoeshere @ItsCherrySue they're horrendous😭
@eDreams_en I've been told that twice already. Can someone just reply to me today. Social media falls under customer service just FYI 💁🏻
Yo @eDreams_en if you need a crash course in handling social media, I'll help y'all out 💁🏻
This response kills me as someone working in social media!I explained days ago my nan had passed away & needed assi… https://t.co/DcJOPZESlK
Lads if you're ever booking flights avoid @eDreams_en like the plague. Disgraceful customer service.
Dealing with a bereavement and then dealing with @eDreams_en is a nightmare. Horrendous customer service at an already hard time.
@eDreams_en Really disappointed you guys didn't come back to me, you had 6 hours to reply 🙄
@eDreams_en thanks, sent it a few hours ago👍🏻
Not being a Scrooge no more 💁🏻🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄 https://t.co/WtQ9sNXNZo

He's visibly high and harassing us all. We've just left Clontarf and he's not getting off, security really need to remove him @IrishRail
And I don't have time to do the tedious task of filing a complaint online 💁🏻 @IrishRail
Was just cornered by someone who can't speak they're so high on your Dart. Why isn't there more security on platforms/trains? @IrishRail
Fuck Sake @IrishRail this is the 5th time I've dealt with people off their heads on your Dart from Raheny to Bray in the last two weeks.
